update iym_inventory_subtract set lsh = #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mxh = #{mxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_clinic_id = #{sysClinicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iym_inventory_type_id = #{iymInventoryTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iym_inventory_id = #{iymInventoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gsm_goods_id = #{gsmGoodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, purchase_tax_rate = #{purchaseTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sell_tax_rate = #{sellTaxRate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ph = #{ph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pch = #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, produced_date = #{producedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pem_supplier_id = #{pemSupplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iym_inventory_add_id = #{iymInventoryAddId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, action_type = #{actionType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approver_id = #{approverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approve_date = #{approveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_state = #{approveState,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from view_iym_inventory_subtract
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(approveState = #{approveState}) and
(pemSupplierName like '${pemSupplierName}%' or pemSupplierCode like '${pemSupplierName}%') and
order by creationDate desc, lsh desc, gsmGoodsOid

select creationDate, lsh, pemSupplierName, sum(quantity * costPrice) as totalCostPrice, creatorName, approverName, approveDate, approveState, sysClinicName from view_iym_inventory_subtract
(DATE_FORMAT(creationDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between #{creationDate[0]} and #{creationDate[1]}) and
(sysClinicId = #{sysClinicId}) and
(approveState = #{approveState}) and
(pemSupplierName like '${pemSupplierName}%' or pemSupplierCode like '${pemSupplierName}%') and
group by lsh order by creationDate desc, lsh desc
